After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. DISCOVER UNLIMITED JOB POSSIBILITIES

CONVENIENCE One Stop Shop - One Day Hiring

Get Hired in One (1) day. Don't waste hours going to different call centers and waiting a few more hours in long lines only to find out that you are not qualified or the job you are interested is not available. After you arrive in ACES CALL CENTER JOBS, you will be processed within 30 minutes and know your possible options on where you are qualified.

Since 2011, over 10,000+ jobseekers found their job through ACES!

CHOICES Comprehensive Active Jobs

Choose from the 20+ Top Call Centers, 150+ locations, 800+ positions, 10,000+ vacancies. There is a perfect job for you in ACES. In ACES, we only endorse you to clients that you have the highest chance of getting hired. Come during our ACES Days and get Hired On The Spot (HOTS)

Since 2011, ACES has consistently been awarded as the Top 3 Recruitment Partner of choice of the Biggest BPOs and Call Centers.

CHARGES It is FREE to apply and ACES gives you 3,000.00 Gift Check to qualified hires.

Since 2011, ACES has given over 30,000,000.00 (Thirty million) worth of SODEXO Gift Checks to thousands of jobseekers hired through ACES.

<p>A Data Scientist who will support our product, sales, leadership and marketing teams with insights gained from analyzing company data. The ideal candidate is adept at using large data sets to find opportunities for product and process optimization and using models to test the effectiveness of different courses of action. They must have strong experience using a variety of data mining/data analysis methods, using a variety of data tools, building and implementing models, using/creating algorithms and creating/running simulations. They must have a proven ability to drive business results with their data-based insights. They must be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams. The right candidate will have a passion for discovering solutions hidden in large data sets and working with stakeholders to improve business outcomes.</p>

<p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.</li>
<li>Mine and analyse data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.</li>
<li>Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.</li>
<li>Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.</li>
<li>Use predictive modelling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting and other business outcomes.</li>
<li>Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality.</li>
<li>Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.</li>
<li>Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyse model performance and data accuracy.</li>

<p>This role will support the Strategic Procurement team in driving the company toward best in class program performance. As an integral part of our Category program management team, this individual will support the program management, reporting, analysis, and relationship-building component of the Procurement organization’s Programs. The role requires a collaborative spirit, an understanding of Strategic Sourcing processes and program management best practices, and the ability to support the implementation and development of program principles within S&amp;P.</p>

<p> </p>

<p><strong>Job Responsibilities</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>As an integral part of our People Services Category Program Team, this individual will support the program management, reporting, analysis, and relationship-building component of the Procurement organization’s Supplier Diversity Program, Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG), and Contingent Labor programs.</li>
<li>Support implementation and enhancement of S&amp;Ps Supplier Diversity, ESG and Contingent Labor programs. Includes policies, procedures, objectives, processes, and communications</li>
<li>Assist in developing annual and multi-year program plans to help meet program goals and continuously improve</li>
<li>Serve as primary point of contact for reporting program, spend improvement, analysis, prime supplier onboarding, and general reporting management</li>
<li>Manage and respond to the program email inboxes</li>
<li>Support and assist in the development of presentations and reports, both internal and external</li>
<li>Work closely with Procurement Analytics Team to measure and report spend and activity (supplier, Business Unit, Enterprise levels). Includes assisting in analyzing data and developing presentation materials</li>
<li>Work with Strategic Sourcing Teams to identify business unit opportunities to utilize diverse suppliers. Includes understanding supply requirements, and identifying/engaging qualified diverse suppliers for consideration in sourcing events</li>
<li>Help implement new and innovative methods to identify and qualify diverse supplier candidates</li>
<li>Identify and help implement opportunities to make it simple for diverse suppliers to apply/qualify/partner with S&amp;P</li>
<li>Support efforts to build relationships with various local and regional diversity council organizations</li>
<li>Coordinate event schedules and the participation of other S&amp;P employees and Business Units (e.g., matchmaking events to identify qualified candidates)</li>
<li>Promote S&amp;P in the Supplier Diversity and ESG community</li>
<li>Support and assist in conducting and leading Supplier Diversity-related training sessions to internal and external stakeholders</li>
<li>Perform other duties as requested that support the success of the Programs</li>

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

<p><strong>The Location:</strong> Makati</p>

<p><strong>Shift</strong>: Must be willing to work on a<strong> Morning</strong> <strong>Shift.</strong> Must be amenable to work on holidays and weekends.</p>

<p><strong>The Team:</strong> Joining a close-knit and professional team, you will gain broad knowledge within the financial world related to all asset classes including; Fixed Income, Commodities, Equities, etc. Moreover, you will get a grasp of different databases and our technical products.</p>

<p><strong>The Impact</strong>:</p>

<ul>
<li>You will integrate into an all-star group and will make a significant impact.</li>
<li>Your position will be meaningful as it is the link between the end-user and our products. (Specifically this product which is the Xpressfeed: https://www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence/en/solutions/xpressfeedtm)</li>
<li>Combining product expertise with a deep understanding of who our clients are and how they use our tools, you will be a consultant providing the best and most efficient way for our clients to achieve quality results.</li>
<li>You will also be an expert on the financial data in the XpressFeed platform, guiding our clients in understanding the data that they are looking at.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>What’s in it for you?</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>This position is an entry-level role with high-performance expectations. You will be working with multiple levels in the team.</li>
<li>There is the potential for advancement, learning and overall career development depending on individual performance and company need.</li>
<li>Due to frequent interactions with sales and product management, this is a highly visible role with high potential for growth outside the department as well.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>As an Associate for the Xpressfeed team you will respond to inquiries for data-feed clients. You will be responsible for providing professional, timely, and quality support of our feed based products.</li>
<li>Have a deep understanding of investments, financial and accounting statements.</li>
<li>Be willing and able to work closely with partners in a team-based environment.</li>
<li>Have excellent interpersonal skills in order to effectively communicate client concerns and product related issues with all our departments. Being technologically savvy is also a plus.</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>

<p>About Statement</p>

<p>At S&amp;P Global Market Intelligence, we know that not all information is important—some of it is vital. Accurate, deep and insightful. We integrate financial and industry data, research, and news into tools that help track performance, generate alpha, identify investment ideas, understand competitive and industry dynamics, perform valuation and assess credit risk. Investment professionals, government agencies, corporations and universities globally can gain the intelligence essential to making business and financial decisions with conviction. Market Intelligence is a division of S&amp;P Global (NYSE: SPGI), which provides essential intelligence for individuals, companies, and governments to make decisions with confidence. For more information, visit: S&amp;P Global Market Intelligence.</p>

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

Get Hired in One (1) day. Don't waste hours going to different call centers and waiting a few more hours in long lines only to find out that you are not qualified or the job you are interested is not available. After you arrive in ACES CALL CENTER JOBS, you will be processed within 30 minutes and know your possible options on where you are qualified.

Since 2011, over 10,000+ jobseekers found their job through ACES!

CHOICES Comprehensive Active Jobs

Choose from the 20+ Top Call Centers, 150+ locations, 800+ positions, 10,000+ vacancies. There is a perfect job for you in ACES. In ACES, we only endorse you to clients that you have the highest chance of getting hired. Come during our ACES Days and get Hired On The Spot (HOTS)

Since 2011, ACES has consistently been awarded as the Top 3 Recruitment Partner of choice of the Biggest BPOs and Call Centers.

CHARGES It is FREE to apply and ACES gives you 3,000.00 Gift Check to qualified hires.

It is FREE to apply with us. ACES Call Center Jobs is the only company in the Philippines that gives an extra Php 3,000.00 SODEXO Gift Checks to its successful hires. This is on top of the incentives that you get from the call centers and is given by ACES.

<p>The nature of the chief executive’s scope is inherently broad; consequently, the special assistant must be a generalist— able to ASSIST in a broad range of areas.</p>

<p>Successful special assistants can Quickly Study and acclimate to new areas of operation. The chief executive might be preparing reports or a talk on accounting and payroll, for example, and the assistant must assist the office of the chief executive by collating sources for the talk or presentation— this is just an example.</p>

<p>Another example might be that the chief executive might be involved in a project that requires processing big data— perhaps thousands of profiles of prospective team members for a new office—; this consequently might call for a simple bot or some macros to be coded; special assistants are trained to assist in some of the more rote coding— in this example.</p>

<p> </p>

<p> </p>

<p><strong>Social Interface </strong></p>

<p>As one of the social interfaces of this chief executive you will play several roles and functions including but not limited to being the chief executive’s Ambassador, being an Explorer or being an Investigator, or simply being a basic Representative. These roles are each definitively unique and trained on internally at our offices.</p>

<p><strong>Technical Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Simple Data Encoding</li>
<li>Programming and Coding
<ul>
<li>Configuring ingrations (managed services)</li>
<li>Interface applications via APIs</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Hardware
<ul>
<li>Assembling workstations (mostly Windows 10 workstations; some Linux)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<p><em>===</em></p>

<p><em>Remember that you do not have to have any stock knowledge on any of these topics; remember that the only requirement here is aptitude, some potential, an open mind, and most importantly, the willingness and conviction to challenge yourself to learn new things at a faster and faster rate, at the start of every new week! </em></p>

<p><em>===</em></p>

<p><strong>Mechanical Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Wood-working</li>
<li>Light electrical work around the office (lights, light switches)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Digital Media Assistant</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Photography and videography; film editing; social media content</li>
<li>Creative writing: fiction, historical fiction, essays</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Executive Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Business writing</li>
<li>Scheduling appointments</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Personal Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>House staff management and training</li>
<li>Errands</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:01:39.579642+00:00 Management and Consultancy 916 Arnaiz Ave Suite 301 Brgy San Lorenzo Makati City Makati Philippines Metro Manila 163663 false false Special Assistant to Chief Executive 549 flexitime food perf_bonus 1 <p><em>Due to these minimum requirements being so qualitative, the interviews and hands-on tests in these areas are quite extensive and ultra-dimensional. </em></p>

<p><strong>Soft Skills Core that can be developed</strong></p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Verbal communication </strong></li>
<li><strong>Written communication </strong></li>
<li><strong>Interpersonal skills</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Technical Aptitude that can be developed</strong></p>

<p>Example test topics include:</p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Workstation assembly</strong> (mostly Windows 10; Linux and other operating systems may be brought up during the interview); BIOS configurations.</li>
<li>Software: Macros, Visual Basic, C++</li>
<li>Managed Services: APIs, Webhooks</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Cultural Compatibility </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Science and Academia</li>
<li>Trade and Industry</li>
<li>Contemporary Arts</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>

<p>---</p>

<p>From day to day your assigned areas will vary drastically. For example, you literally might assist the chief executive on a woodworking task, then some low-level software programming, then at the day’s end, attend a business development exploratory meeting with the executive. Due to the broad range in activities, we test for aptitude and potential, not stock knowledge. Remember, though, we are not hiring carpenters and software engineers, we are hiring people that can be trained on-the-job. Again, we are not hiring for stock knowledge or work history (experience): we are hiring for aptitude and potential to grow (and grow Fast).</p>		 84.21052631578948 true special-assistant-to-chief-executive Full time public 200

Likewise, the company specialises in sourcing out highly skilled and multi-talented IT professionals because the company mostly caters to clients being widely known to be in the IT industry.

Hunter’s Hub sets itself apart from the rest of the company in the industry due to the various prominent selections of services that are custom-fit for our clients and the numerous kinds of professionals we are able to provide. Our services are highly based off of our clients’ needs and requirements, and we are able to dispense any kind of personnel that they need whether professional or non-professional. The Senior Linux Systems Administrator will be responsible for designing, building and deploying secure Linux systems and automating repetitive tasks using Ansible, Python or suitable utilities and leveraging other data center automation technologies. The sysadmin will also be responsible for ensuring Linux system vulnerabilities are addressed promptly and work to remedy legacy vulnerability and configuration issues.</p>

➢ Experience in Unix enterprise environment Linux<br>
➢ Experience of configuring Kickstart for unattended Operating System installation and<br>
configuration.<br>
➢ Experience of configuring disk-based technologies: RAID, LVM and storage area networks (SAN)<br>
➢ Hands-on experience of IT Automation and configuration management tools and concepts.<br>
➢ Familiarity with enterprise backup and configuration management tools and principles.</p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:22:43.198340+00:00 IT and Software Pasig Philippines Metro Manila 143812 false false System Administrator for Linux 1 1 <p><strong>General skills:</strong><br>
➢ Extensive knowledge of paging/swapping, inter-process communication, job scheduling, file system concepts like i-node and superblock.<br>
➢ Proven experience in writing detailed shell scripts.<br>
➢ Ability to perform debugging and modification of C programs.<br>
➢ Experience in performing security audits and protecting systems against attack<br>
➢ Knowledge of RHEL7/CentOS7 preferable<br>
➢ Experience with ESXI VMware version 6.5+ preferable.<br>
➢ Demonstrated knowledge of hardware devices, operating systems, databases, applications, SSL, PKI and how they interrelate<br>
➢ Demonstrated ability of advanced system structures and commands. (TCP/IP, DNS, RAID, volume management, backups, etc.)</p>

<p><strong>Desired Experience &amp; Qualities</strong><br>
➢ Deep experience in systems admin in a Linux enterprise environment<br>
➢ Excellent scripting skills (Python, Perl, Bash/Shell).<br>
➢ Perform security audits of internal systems where necessary to ensure compliance with corporate security standards.<br>
➢ Ability to perform forensic analysis on systems in case of any type of security breach<br>
➢ Expert knowledge of networking, storage (EMC), security, virtualization (VMWare), clustering and high availability concepts.<br>
➢ Experience working with containerization technologies such as Docker or Kubernetes.<br>
➢ Work effectively with a team of System Administrators/Engineers to maintain uptime,<br>
consistency, scalability, and performance while meeting business needs.<br>
➢ Work effectively with System Administrators/Engineers, DBA’s, Programmers, Project Managers, Business Representatives, Vendors and/or Analysts to complete tasks in a timely manner.<br>
➢ Working knowledge of VMware virtualization (vSphere, vRealize Automation), VMware certifications a plus<br>
➢ Solid understanding network technologies like switching, routing, DNS, VXLAN, SDN, etc.<br>
➢ Working with Cloud-type technologies and companies such as AWS and Azure<br>
➢ Oracle WebLogic Server and Oracle Coherence is a distinct advantage</p>

<p><strong>Qualifications and Accreditations:</strong><br>
➢ RHCSA (Red Hat Certified System Administrator)<br>
➢ LFCS (Linux Foundation Certified System Administrator)<br>
➢ UNIX certifications, such as HP-UX, AIX, SUN Solaris are an added advantage<br>
➢ ITIL Foundation certified<br>
➢ Oracle Linux OCA &amp; OCP is a plus</p>

The Sysadmin reports to the Infrastructure Head.</p>		 100 true system-administrator-for-linux Full time public 300

- Food ingredients and raw materials

- Cosmetic raw materials
- Commodities
- Industrial chemicals

Our Headquarters are located in Parañaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The Representative Office is situated in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon), Vietnam.

History

Our years of first-hand frontline experience in the marketplace, know-how in sourcing from manufacturers and traders world-wide, and European Management with Oriental Expertise provide both, suppliers and clients, with a reliable partner for a long-term business relationship and mutual benefit.

WHY JOIN US?

Cultures and Values

Rudolf Lietz Inc. is a German-Filipino company located at Paranaque City, Philippines. Our culture follows that of similar German companies where we take pride on being organised, working to the book and executing high quality work. It is of utmost importance to stay not just one but several steps ahead of the competition but doing so through the quality of work. We also invite our team members to be creative with the work they do often working in smaller teams to solve much bigger problem.

After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. 2020-10-28T07:37:22.212002+00:00 2020-12-28T16:00:00+00:00 18000 false filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

THE STORY OF THE HALLMARK BRAND AND FILSTAR, THE COMPANY, IN THE PHILIPPINES

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. The successful introduction of the All About Scrapbooking brand spearheaded the art of scrapbooking in the Philippines. It is now the top of mind brand of scrapbooking enthusiasts and hobbyists.		 22812 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/HE3KW56HQ9WRQHMYHZ4Y-5a2118fe.png Filstar Distributors Corporation true true filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

THE STORY OF THE HALLMARK BRAND AND FILSTAR, THE COMPANY, IN THE PHILIPPINES

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. The successful introduction of the All About Scrapbooking brand spearheaded the art of scrapbooking in the Philippines. <li>Monitor and maintain the computer systems and networks of an organization.</li>

Designs, develops, modifies, debugs and/or maintains software code according to functional, non-functional and technical design specifications. Follows Amdocs software engineering standards, applicable software development methodology (such as design-led thinking, DevOps, etc) and release processes. Ensures code is well designed, testable, maintainable, scalable and supportable. Develops software verification plans and automation, and integrates software components into a fully functional software system. Promotes system reliability and operability. Provides demos of software products to stakeholders.</p>

<ul>
<li>Investigation - Investigates issues by reviewing/debugging code, provides fixes (analyze and fix bugs) and workarounds, reviews changes for operability to maintain existing software solutions.</li>
<li>Analysis - Analyzes requirement documents/HLDs. Performs impact assessment (for example, for critical production issues) and contributes to Root Cause Analysis of issues and outlines corrective actions.</li>
<li>Team Work, Collaboration and Empowerment - Collaborates and adds value through participation in peer code reviews, provides comments and suggestions, makes decisions together quickly and effectively, and works with cross functional teams to achieve goals. Work as technical interface with other teams to resolve issues related to interfacing functionalities.</li>
<li>Technical Ownership - Assumes technical accountability for his/her specific work products within an application and provides technical support during solution design for new requirements. Ensures that documentation related to specific modules/applications is correct and up to date. Performs peer code inspection, reviews developed solutions, and provides relevant feedback.</li>
<li>Innovation and Continuous Improvement - Actively searches for innovation, continuous improvement and efficiency in all assigned tasks.</li>
<li>Quality and SLAs - Contribute to meet various SLAs and KPIs as applicable, for example, Responsiveness, Resolution, Software Quality SLAs, etc. Ensures assigned tasks are completed on time and delivery timelines are met in accordance with quality targets of the organization.</li>
</ul>

<p> Aligning with the systems engineering team to propose and deploy new hardware and software environments required for Hadoop and to expand existing environments.</p>

<p> Working with data delivery teams to setup new Hadoop users. This job includes setting up Linux users, setting up Kerberos principals and testing HDFS, Hive, Pig and MapReduce access for the new users.</p>

<p> Cluster maintenance for Cloudera Management Cluster</p>

<p> Performance tuning of Hadoop clusters, MapReduce, Yarn and Spark</p>

<p> Screen Hadoop cluster job performances and capacity planning</p>

<p> Troubleshooting errors on Infrastructure and Platform level (Network/Connectivity/System) encountered by the team</p>

<p> Monitor Hadoop cluster connectivity and security</p>

<p> Manage and review Hadoop log files.</p>

<p> File system management and monitoring.</p>

<p> HDFS support and maintenance.</p>

<p> Cloud Administration (AWS/Azure)</p>

<p> Diligently teaming with the infrastructure, network, database, application and business intelligence teams to guarantee high data quality and availability.</p>

<p> Collaborating with application teams to install operating system and Hadoop updates, patches, version upgrades when required.</p>

<p> Point of Contact for Vendor escalation</p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:22:43.198340+00:00 IT and Software Cityland 10 Tower 2, 154 H.V Dela Costa St. Corner Valero, Bel-air, Makati City Pasig Philippines NCR 156265 false false Hadoop Admin 10 1 <p>Desired Experience &amp; Qualities</p>

2020-10-30T12:24:09.150915+00:00 2020-12-28T16:00:00+00:00 false transnational-diversified-group The Transnational Diversified Group of Companies (TDG) is a globally competitive and progressive business group of highly successful companies engaged in leading industries. Since its establishment in 1976, TDG now has more than 30 member companies that are major players in diverse industries such as:

TOTAL LOGISTICS(Shipping, Transportation, Cargo Forwarding, Warehousing, Vehicle Logistics, Customs Brokerage, 3rd and 4th Party Logistics, Trucking, Distribution, Liner and Tramp Agency Service)

TOTAL SHIP MANAGEMENT(Ship Crewing, Seafarer Training, Maritime Education, Tanker Operations, Medical Services and Financial Services)

AIR &amp; TRAVEL SERVICES(Tours, Travel Agency Services, Airline GSA, Ground-Handling, Cargo Handling, Airport Support &amp; Aviation Services)</p>

INFORMATION &amp; COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY SERVICES(Contact Centers, Business Process Outsourcing Services, Software Development and E-Business Solutions), as well as Securities Trading, Real Estate Development, Renewable Energy, and other supplemental businesses.<br>
With its world-class excellence and win-win outlook, TDG has become a respected strategic partner of large global corporations with stringent requirements for total quality and cost-effective services in both traditional and new economy businesses. TDG’s distinguished partners and principals include NYK Line (Japan), Asiana Airlines (Korea), American Express (USA), Vroon B.V. (Netherlands), Yusen Logistics (Japan), Crystal Cruises (USA), Malaysia Airlines (Malaysia), Disney Cruise Line (USA), ePerformax Contact Centers (USA), Nippon Container Terminal (Japan) and Uyeno Transtech Ltd. (Japan).</p>

<p>A Partner and Employer of Choice, TDG has grown from one strategic partner and 16 employees in 1976 to more than 30 business partners and over 14,000 employees to date.<br>

2020-11-09T07:02:57.204380+00:00 2021-01-29T16:00:00+00:00 false st-luke-s-medical-center-1 The foremost and the most admired hospital in the Philippines, St. Luke's Medical Center (SLMC) has provided high-quality healthcare for over a century.

It was founded in 1903 with a mission to provide outstanding out-patient care. Today it is the foremost and most admired hospital in the Philippines and an acknowledged leader in Asia.

St. Luke's delivers on its mission of healing by gathering under one roof the finest medical expertise, the most sophisticated medical technology and facilities, and a deep-rooted culture of compassion. It supports this mission with research and continuing education for those who serve. The total dedication to quality and caring of the St. Luke's family is what distinguishes the hospital as a center of healthcare excellence in Asia.

These centers of excellence bring to the Philippines the latest medical advances and treatment modalities. Over 1,700 hospital-affiliated medical consultants see out-patients in more than 450 private clinics.

SLMC is the undisputed leader in virtually all medical specialties, including cardiovascular medicine, neurology and neurosurgery, cancer, ophthalmology, and digestive and liver diseases. It is the first choice of medical and health-related practitioners and patients for executive check-ups.

SLMC receives patients from around Asia, Micronesia, the Middle East, Europe and the United States.

With its rich legacy of excellence and a second new and modern facility at the Fort Bonifacio Global City, SLMC is in a position to realize a bolder vision of the institution as one of the top five hospitals in Asia by 2010.		 20435 Hospital / Health Care https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/WLFHZJPKKA846NPH3BFX6EGHK5LTDCA76TABZLSL-5ac579af.png St. Luke's Medical Center true true st-luke-s-medical-center-1 The foremost and the most admired hospital in the Philippines, St. Luke's Medical Center (SLMC) has provided high-quality healthcare for over a century.

<p>Build client bases to keep current client policies up-to-date and prospects new clients actively.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Review clients’ Sun Life accounts, at least once a year, to check economic and market changes and suggest plan readjustment if needed.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Explain to clients all terms of the life insurance contract or mutual fund and ensure they understand it.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Turn over to the company the money collected within 24 hours.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Maintain performance and production based on the minimum agency standards.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Assist clients in life insurance claims, fund withdrawal, and other concerns.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Practice always strictest confidentiality (in compliance with R.A. 10173 Data Privacy Act) and act in the client’s best interest.</p>
</li>
</ol>

<p><strong>Important Notes: </strong></p>

<p>Remuneration for this position is performance-based. Aside from the usual sales commission, there is an additional monthly performance bonus for those who meet the targets.</p>

<p><em>Star Ruby is a growing business unit under <a href="http://popl.ink/cedarNBO" rel="nofollow">Cedar New Business Office (NBO)</a> -- who is among the top producing NBOs in Sun Life, and home of the elite MDRTs and top advisor awardees. <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/angelgagam" rel="nofollow">Angel Carlos-Gagam</a> currently heads the team. </em></p>

<p><em><a href="http://popl.ink/cedarNBO" rel="nofollow">Cedar NBO</a> is located in Makati. Nonetheless, candidates in other locations (especially within NCR and CALABARZON) are encouraged apply. Qualified candidates will be trained initially here, and may report (upon agreement with superior) to any Sun Life satellite offices once licensed.</em></p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:19:23.655487+00:00 Sales and Marketing Ace Building, Rada cor Dela Rosa Sts., Legaspi Village Makati Philippines Metro Manila 111234 false false 2019-02-08T05:03:03.155977+00:00 111234 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 800 Sales and Marketing Knowledge 2015-06-07T05:29:59.878801+00:00 800 2019-02-08T05:03:03.155977+00:00 111234 2015-06-07T13:40:07.483949+00:00 false 2235 People Management 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 2235 2019-02-08T05:03:03.155977+00:00 111234 2015-06-25T07:13:06.458471+00:00 false 2933 Problem Solving 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 2933 2019-02-08T05:03:03.155977+00:00 111234 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 false 19748 Closing Sales 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 19748 150000 Financial Advisor | Full-Time | Star Ruby Unit 15 <ul>

2020-11-02T14:56:27.258997+00:00 2021-10-30T16:00:00+00:00 false costuless A DTI, IPO, SEC REGISTERED & CERTIFIED COMPANY

As a leader in the Commercial Furniture and Business Furniture & Interiors market we have assembled what we believe to be a terrific collection of excellent, high quality furniture solutions designed specifically for today's environment.

Cost U less Group established in 2007 is a professionally managed Business with a proven and credible track record having delivered various projects and its products and services across the Philippine’s leading Architects, Interior Designers and Project Managers, Top 5000 Companies and Small to Medium institutions, Schools, Churches and Government agencies. Our skill is transforming their ideas into designs with a truly satisfying customer and client experience.

Our Products have been manufactured through stringent processes in factories from a variety of countries including China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Korea, Germany, U.S.A., India and South East Asia with whom we have a long and established relationship. We also manufacture many items here in the Philippines, such as our Customized Ergodynamic & Longlife Office chairs, Workstations, File Cabinets, Contract Furniture & Lifetime Interiors.

With Warehousing & Manufacturing plants in Guangdong, Shenzhen, & Tianjin China and Taguig & Bulacan Philippines, we can provide a truly national focus with a national distribution network second to none.

“Our Makati office furniture showroom is open for your use. Our web site is open 24/7.”

Our space planning and great designs allow for you to select from a multitude of co-ordinated office layouts from the front end at reception, through the administration workstation area, executive offices and meeting rooms.

From the very beginning, Cost U Less’ approach to business was highly consumer oriented – delivering the best quality product at the most economic pricing.

Sensing the growing demand for quality products, Cost U Less invested in warehousing, factories, office buildings, a showroom, workshops, logistics equipment, transportation etc.
Cost U Less’ current projects are the expansion and construction of its new state of the art Showroom and office in Makati City Philippines, and the diversification of its reach in terms of marketing & sales.


Cost U Less established a stable infrastructure that supported optimal distribution of products at the most economic terms to its customers.

Cost U Less also employed several local staff and invested in their development through education, training and experience across industries.
The group also manages an exclusive brand portfolio of Ergodynamic, Longlife, Sumo, Sumotop, Lifetime Interiors, Isafe, Factory 2 U, and Cost U Less.
On the industrial front, Cost U Less has stabilized operations in Office & Restaurant Furniture assembly and manufacturing and other products. Cost U Less’ service sector covers Fit out, Space Planning, 3D design & conceptualization and sustainability. S/he prepares the annual and quarterly marketing plans, proactively hunts for target firms &amp; establishes communication with those organizations that can benefit from the Company’s products &amp; services. S/he reviews the productions and leads generated by his/her team and works with the Sales Director to set strategies &amp; course of action for new market saturation.</p>

<p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Solicits new and existing accounts to meet and exceed revenue goals through telephone prospecting (telemarketing), outside sales calls on accounts within area assignment, new referral accounts, inactive listings of file or accounts in the existing Company’s Customer Database as endorsed by the Country Manager and other new sources ; Renders site inspections and written communications as scheduled and as assigned to identify and qualify new business prospects</li>
<li>Proposal and Managing set up, schedules, requirements and overall necessary functions to the implementation of tradeshows, conventions, and Increases involvement with existing clients by visiting tradeshows, conventions, areas/buildings, hotels and restaurants areas/buildings, hotels and restaurants</li>
<li>Formulate, direct and coordinate marketing activities and draft policies on those based on how to promote products and services while working with the Sales Team ( this includes online marketing, SEO, sem, advertising, graphics and material preparation, visual display, sale events preparation, leaflet distribution, webmail newsletter, text blasting, email blasting, telemarketing, cold calling, direct saturation, in-store marketing activities etc.)</li>
<li>Further develops multi-tier relationships to increase clients’ accounts by participating in marketing activities when scheduled</li>
<li>Consults with Inventory system or the Warehouse Manager/Supervisor or Product Development Associate on product availability and specifications such as design, color, and packaging, etc.</li>
<li>Attends &amp; participates in sales department meetings</li>
<li>Builds referrals &amp; leads new &amp; existing client network</li>
<li>Provide alternative Marketing methods by researching marketing trends, suggests ads placements either by conventional methods like newspaper, magazines, etc and or modern methods like online advertising, website promotions, in store promotions, thematic sale events,</li>
<li>Use sales forecasting and strategic planning with the Sales Team to ensure the sales and profitability of the Company’s product offerings and services, analyze business developments and monitors the industry’s market trends online and offline</li>
<li>Initiate market research and analyze findings in comparison with the offerings of competitors which includes price checks. Consult randomly the existing clients to gain advice regarding the types of products or services which are expected to be in demand</li>
<li>Defines, records &amp; monitors daily sales targets through Sales Calls Report &amp; New Accounts Report</li>
<li>Consults the Customer Service Representative regarding the feedback and concerns of the existing or new clients and cascade the relevant information to the Manager and Sales Team which they can provide proactive solutions</li>
<li>Performs other administrative deliverables as assigned by the Country Manager and Sr. Sales Manager</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>

After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. The Solution Architect (SA) will participate in the development and maintenance of business and system architecture and conduct business information flow studies. Provides integrated systems planning and recommends new or different technologies that will enhance current systems and support overall corporate and business goals. Conducts system architecture studies of new and existing IT systems to permit the development of integrated systems that operate at low-cost levels</p>

Recruiter Notes<br>
➢ Business Architecture: How does a customer apply for a loan online?<br>
➢ Data Architecture: What information is needed to enable loan risk assessment and<br>
processing? How to manage customer info with maximum security, integrity, cost, performance, and reliability<br>
➢ Application Architecture: What UX, process management and functional system<br>
components/services are needed to enable customer loan application via mobile and<br>
web devices?<br>
➢ Integration Architecture: How will the distributed application component and services talk to each other?<br>
➢ Security Architecture: How to properly verify and authenticate customer identity? How to ensure that customer data is secure in a distributed environment? How to prevent unauthorized data access and data theft over the wire<br>
➢ Technology Architecture: How to configure supporting infrastructure for high availability and recoverability in case of system or facility failure?<br>

2020-10-28T10:55:15.853845+00:00 2020-12-26T16:00:00+00:00 false fly-ace-corporation-2 In 1972, Lucio Conchanco Sr. and Ederlina Cochanco, began a family legacy by setting up The Jolly General Merchandise as a retailer of agricultural products. In 1986, the company under the leadership of the Conchanco siblings, evolved as an active trading enterprise dealing in fast moving consumer goods.

Fly Ace Corporation was incorporated in 1993. The company first ventured into its first owned brand with canned vegetables and packaged fruits under the JOLLY brand in 1997. This was followed by several other company owned brands to include Mediterranean products under the Dona Elena brand, oriental food products under the Good Life brand and Milk products under the Jolly Cow brand.

From a small office in Binondo, Manila, the company is now housed in its own headquarters, the Fly Ace Corporate Center, in Central Business Park, Pasay City. From having two employees, Fly Ace now employs more than two hundred professionals, all experts in their respective fields.		 24975 Food / Beverages https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/UNHKAQ6DS8XWTLYW7V4EZDVM6975DY9SLX9A3YXC-5af27ac0.png Fly Ace Corporation false true fly-ace-corporation-2 In 1972, Lucio Conchanco Sr. and Ederlina Cochanco, began a family legacy by setting up The Jolly General Merchandise as a retailer of agricultural products. Fly Ace Corporation was incorporated in 1993. The company first ventured into its first owned brand with canned vegetables and packaged fruits under the JOLLY brand in 1997. This was followed by several other company owned brands to include Mediterranean products under the Dona Elena brand, oriental food products under the Good Life brand and Milk products under the Jolly Cow brand.

From a small office in Binondo, Manila, the company is now housed in its own headquarters, the Fly Ace Corporate Center, in Central Business Park, Pasay City. From having two employees, Fly Ace now employs more than two hundred professionals, all experts in their respective fields.		 false Food / Beverages false https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/M9DSP6SHP9MG7G5FQY7TWEXEPB482TYLVZHTUQEF-5af27ac0.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/88Z7M27457K8KPKF5BRCL26U5K9PZPPGGXBW9Z4W-5af27ac3.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/XEP4Q8L8PU8XP69UZMMZ94WLG4N4CKRDH7ZQ9QWT-5af27ac2.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/UNHKAQ6DS8XWTLYW7V4EZDVM6975DY9SLX9A3YXC-5af27ac0.png Fly Ace Corporation http://www.flyacecorp.com/home Fly Ace Corporation 2020-10-28T08:27:24.619548+00:00 <p><strong>I. Position Mission:</strong></p>

<p>Ensuring effective implementation of company's established quality standards in response to consumer specifications and in compliance to legislative standards. The position calls for providing active leadership involvement in ensuring that product quality is maintained thereby protecting the image of the brand and the company, as reflected in the VMOS.</p>

<p><strong>II. Primary Deliverables </strong></p>

<p><strong>Sampling, Documentation and Laboratory:</strong></p>

<p>1. Primary in charge in evaluating Watch list and other sensitive Items. Takes</p>

<p>necessary photos needed for QAIR.</p>

<p>2. Conducts cut out test, this test include VC measurement, Gross weight, Net</p>

<p>weight, Drained weight (if any) of watch list and other sensitive items.</p>

<p>3. Conducts physico-chemical analysis. This test includes Soluble Solid, (using</p>

<p>Digital Refractometer), % Salt (Digital Salt Meter), pH (pH meter), viscosity</p>

<p>(Viscometer) of watch list items</p>

<p>4. Conduct Packaging integrity test of watch list and sensitive items</p>

<p>5. Conduct daily calibration of instruments</p>

<p>6. Validate report encoded by the QAA and make necessary recommendation.</p>

<p>7. Advise the result of evaluation via email.</p>

<p>8. Submit QAIR per sku within 3 day lead time.</p>

<p>9. Submit findings of HOLD items within 3 days</p>

<p>10. Issues Certificate of Analysis.</p>

<p>11. Issues and verifies Product Specification of FAC products.</p>

<p>12. Immediately reports packaging/label alteration to assigned PM.</p>

<p>13. Advise new SKUs via email.</p>

<p>14. Verifies barcode of new and existing products</p>

<p>15. Communicates with other department regarding special concerns and provides</p>

<p>document requests/attend queries on quality concerns on products. (eg. EIRAD, regarding shipment/delivery concerns/Product pictures; Invoicing,</p>

<p>regarding COA and documents needed for delivery; Logistics Inventory, for batch code concerns/requests; FSG/Sales/Marketing; Weekly verification of</p>

<p>destructed samples prior releasing for consumption).</p>

<p>16. Evaluation of Supplier’s Sample (Conducts cut out test, physico-chemical</p>

<p>analysis and sensory evaluation on the samples and generates supplier’s evaluation report)</p>

<p><strong>Receiving</strong></p>

<p>1. Generates Incident Report for Containers with concerns. (e.g., discrepancies on the declared quantity or item description on receiving report (RR)/Packing list (PL) with damaged stocks)</p>

<p>2. Updates Checker Receiving Report file and Local Deliveries received in the Import RR shared file.</p>

<p><strong>QAA External Affairs</strong></p>

<p>1. On-site Inspection of product shipment:</p>

<p>a. Primarily in-charge of supervising the visual inspection of the finished goods</p>

<p>prior releasing; inspection of container condition before loading; and oversees during loading of stocks in the container.</p>

<p>b. Generates report on the percentage of reject, hold, container loading, and other product quality-related concerns.</p>

<p>2. On-Site Inspection of products in third party toll packer.</p>

<p>a. Counter checking of materials for toll packing</p>

<p>b. Oversee in-line inspection during the production process</p>

<p>c. Verifies and generates the final output</p>

<p><strong>III. Secondary Deliverables </strong></p>

<p><strong>Sampling, Documentation and Laboratory:</strong></p>

<p>1. Oversee the activities of the QAA.</p>

<p>2. Monitors the condition of the equipment/tools used in executing job and report to superior.</p>

<p>3. Daily verification of Warehouse Temperature Monitoring conducted by assigned lab aide.</p>

<p>4. Monitors and submit monthly trending of Delivery Performance Report per supplier.</p>

<p><strong>Receiving</strong></p>

<p>1. Checks container condition for forwarders and outgoing trucker</p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T09:21:17.392507+00:00 Manufacturing and Production 7th Floor Fly Ace Corporate Center, 13 Coral Way, Pasay, Metro Manila, Philippines (Beside KLine Bldg. near Jetti gas station in Macapagal Blvd. and also near MOA Arena) Quezon City Philippines Metro Manila 163355 false false 24000 Quality Assurance Specialist 1 retirement sick_leave family_leave life_ins paid_leave mat_pat_leave 1 <p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p>

<li>Manage project deliverables based on approved scope, timeline, and requirements</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>Application Support Management
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-roman;">
<li>Supervise deliverables of application support team for escalated system concerns</li>
<li>Recommend technical enhancements to support implemented applications based on raised system concerns</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>Supervision and administration of the Business Analysis team
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<li>Distribution of workload to the team members to maintain adept performance levels relative to IT projects and application support standards</li>
<li>Review and processing of inquiries and concerns handled by the team members</li>
<li>Administration of training and support to the team members’ knowledge and skills to effectively carry out the assigned work</li>

<li>Supervision on the billings and other reimbursements processing of the team members</li>
<li>Review and validation of business process management and project management reports, analyses, recommendations, and other measures, strategies and procedures conducted and/or initiated by the team members</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>Handling of inquiries and requests relative to business and system enhancements/developments, including after “go-live” system support</li>
<li>Recommendation of, and participation in any process improvements and system enhancements/developments concerning the core responsibilities of the team</li>
<li>Preparation of reports, analyses, and recommendations to the Department Head, Management, Brand, and other Units, as needed</li>

<p>Slidegenius is the premier global Presentation Design Agency with over 100+ employees. Our team of designers provides presentation design solutions to over 3,000 clients including Adidas, Reebok, Facebook, Blizzard, Delta Airlines, NASCAR, JP Morgan, and many more. We work with clients both big and small, providing us with new and exciting projects every day. In addition to PowerPoint, we offer a wide array of print services.</p>

<p><br>
<strong>What the heck is a Data Scientist?</strong></p>

<p>SG Interactive is looking for a Software Engineer/Data Scientist to join our team in Makati. A Software Engineer/Data Scientist that can contribute to the development of a data science/data analytics service, leveraging strong hands-on technical expertise, exceptional communications and interpersonal skills and people management experience.</p>

<p>You will have the opportunity to apply your data science skills to several R&amp;D projects in our product lines SlideSuite and Carstir, and to their respective analytics. You will have the opportunity to contribute to design and prototyping of systems in collaboration with top computer vision researchers and data engineers.</p>

<p><strong>Your role</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Contributing member of Machine Learning &amp; Predictive User Experience team. Team functions to prototype and develop features relying on prediction and automation</li>
<li>Develop software for a production cloud-based data management project</li>
<li>Identifying trends and relationships within data</li>
<li>Using trend data to improve application performance and business operations</li>
<li>Contribute to the setup of build and development tools</li>
<li>Contribute to algorithm tuning and development</li>
<li>Developing strategies to optimize data and search</li>
<li>Devise a strategy for configuring application recommendation engines</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Other responsibilities may include:</strong></p>

<p>Work closely with Management and Business Development team to grow the practice in your geographical area, this will include:</p>

<ul>
<li>Work on the material to support presentation to clients</li>
<li>Work with our U.S. team to develop product roadmaps</li>
<li>Work on a commercial and technical proposal with the business development team</li>
<li>Assess and evaluate new potential recruits in SG Interactive team</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>What is the office culture like?</strong></p>

<p>Each SG Interactive office has its own fun and unique culture, developed by the diverse teams of designers and managers that work there. At the root of each office environment lies the foundational culture that was grown at our headquarters in San Diego.</p>

<p>Here in Manila, a city full of heart, we reflect that description in our office environment. Covering Asia hours and then some, the Asia office culture mirrors the collaborative foundations from our San Diego HQ to bring 24-hour coverage to SG Interactive. This has grown an environment of next-level collaboration—a unique mix between independent space, colleagues within and across departments always willing to jump in and lend a hand, and an overall no-fuss can-do attitude. We strongly support each person's personal time, leading us to work hard and work well together so that when you go home, you can really go home. We enjoy all types of music, corny jokes, and a whole flurry of other interests brought about by each new person who joins the team.</p>

<p><strong>Am I going to be able to grow with this company?</strong></p>

<p>We offer a structured and transparent path for each member of the team. You will know where you stand at all times and your manager will highlight exactly what needs to be done in order for you to get to the place you want to be. In addition to offering growth within a given department, we also allow for inter-departmental growth if you show an aptitude in another area. And the growth doesn’t stop there, as the company itself is growing at an amazing rate, providing new and exciting opportunities for our team every day!</p>

<p><strong>Okay, so… What's the catch?</strong></p>

<p>The catch is that you have to bring your ‘A’ game. We expect our employees to bring positive, creative energy into the office everyday. That way we can face any challenge that gets thrown our way, knowing that we will be able to lean on each other for support</p>

<p><strong>Where do I sign up?</strong></p>

<p>If you think this position is a good fit for you and that you are a good fit for us, we would love for you to send in the following for us to review:</p>

<ul>
<li>Resume</li>
<li>Cover letter</li>
<li>Link to portfolio (digital or download)</li>
<li>Monthly/Salary request based on a 40 hour work week</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:38:18.166062+00:00 IT and Software Salcedo Makati Philippines Kalakhang Maynila 28541 false false 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 564 HTML 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 564 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 656 Angular.js 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 656 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 663 ASP.NET 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 663 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 675 jQuery 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 675 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 709 JavaScript 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 709 2016-05-13T01:06:25.327816+00:00 28541 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 720 CSS 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 720 Data Scientist 5 single_leave med_ins sick_leave food family_leave paid_holidays paid_leave mat_pat_leave 1 <p><strong>What sort of qualifications do I need?</strong></p>

<p>Skills and Attributes</p>

<ul>
<li>Bachelor's in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related technology field</li>
<li>Familiar with concepts in Statistics</li>
<li>High proficiency programming in ASP.NET MVC 5</li>
<li>Quick learning with excellent analytical and problem-solving skills</li>
<li>Comfortable with rapid development cycles</li>
<li>Machine learning experience a big plus</li>
<li>Automotive R&amp;D experience a big plus</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Equal opportunity: </strong><br>
SG Interactive is an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.</p>

<p><strong>Job Type: </strong>Full-time</p>

<p><strong>Schedule: </strong>Shifting Schedule</p>

<p><strong>Required experience:</strong></p>

<p>The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years designing and developing web applications built on Microsoft.NET for ASP.NET MVC. This position will leverage candidate’s experience with front-end development (HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery) and back-end development (C#, MVC, SQL Design, and Entity Framework). 2020-10-14T09:30:32.876983+00:00 2020-11-29T16:00:00+00:00 false pjlhullier The P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies is composed of various companies ranging from its flagship business of pawn brokering to local and international remittance, micro-insurance, rural banking, hotel and restaurant management, jewelry and sports accessory retail, information technology, real estate, professional management, and corporate social responsibility.

History

Formally established in 1988, PJ Lhuillier,Inc. (PJLI) is a dynamic, multi-industry company that owns and operates businesses dealing with pawnshop, non-pawnshop financial services (banking, international and local remittance, non-life insurance, electronic loading, bills payment, and collection service), retail (jewelry and health and wellness products), hotel and restaurant management, information technology management, sports, and real estate/property management.

It is the proud parent company of Cebuana Lhuillier, one of the leading and largest non-bank financial services providers in the Philippines with over 1,700 branches nationwide. PJLI attributes its dominance in the industry to integrity and heartfelt service, its robust network of local and international industry partners, and its steadfast commitment to nurture market-leading businesses for its growing clientele.

Today, the P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies seeks to become the best and preferred microfinancial and business-to-business solutions partner. The company intends to fulfil this vision through rendering dedication, hard work, and service.


Company Mission
To enable more Filipinos to have access to financial solutions.

Company Vision
To be the best and preferred microfinancial and business-to-business solutions partner with a heart.		 612 Financial Services https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/kalibrr-company-assets/logos/XKCX4AJ5TVJ78U77KKS2-5852042a.jpg PJ Lhuillier Group of Companies true true pjlhullier The P.J. Renthub for car rentals, Nexthub for car repair services, Painthub for automotive body and paint, ACCS and VKool for car parts and accessories.

Autohub Group of Companies, Inc. is a registered business under the Securities and Exchange Commission on July 19, 2007, with its corporate office at Block 15, Ford Global City Building, Rizal Drive, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig. Its primary function is to manage the different dealerships/brands indicated above. It is headed by its President and Dealer Principal, Mr. Willy Q. Tee Ten.

Autohub is your One-Stop-Auto Shop! Its product range consists of high-end to entry level vehicles (i.e. passenger cars, SUV’s, pick-ups, 4-6 wheeler cab and chassis trucks and motorcycles), genuine and aftermarket parts and accessories, and car care products.

Autohub is equipped with the world’s finest machines, as well as highly trained, qualified sales and service personnel, to provide its clientele with all their vehicle requirement’s needs while maintaining excellent customer satisfaction through efficient and quality customer oriented programs and the centralization of its group sales and service activities.

VISION – to be the preferred Automotive Group for innovative solutions, quality products and reliable services.

MISSION – to provide comprehensive automotive products and services through synergy that would ensure complete customer satisfaction and best interest of all stakeholders.

2020-10-20T02:38:15.186125+00:00 2021-01-30T16:00:00+00:00 false sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

SKY serves the business community through SKYBIZ, Its corporate and commercial arm, which delivers content (SKYcable) and connectivity (SKY Fiber) services to any business of any size.		 17061 Cable and Telecommunications https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/YRBMYTQF3DTVF5CA8X8H3R9YA46P7R77P2BYHV97-5e4e207b.png Sky Cable Corporation false true sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

2020-11-09T03:14:31.312106+00:00 2020-12-29T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

Today in terms of product availability, quality, durability, and affordability, we at Ramesh Trading Corporation are enjoying a reputation for being one of the most reliable suppliers in the country.		 16543 Importer | Wholesaler | Distributor https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/RRFM9A955SAR5CZBMZZJLLFGLHF9WJ3RDQL36TSK-5e1d805f.png Ramesh Trading Corporation true true ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. <p><strong>TRENDS</strong> empowers our clients with technology-enabled business services allowing them to transcend. Topping the Philippine ICT industry for more than 25 years and catering to different organizations across industries, we prioritize customer satisfaction by delivering only the best and most effective services. We usher our clients into the digital future by harnessing the power of technology and our years of expertise. To stay true to our commitment to excellence and providing innovative and sustainable services, we have expanded with regional offices in Clark, Cavite, Laguna, Cebu and Davao and international offices in Vietnam and Cambodia.</p>

<p>The training will run for three (3) weeks from 8:30 AM to 6PM, Mondays to Fridays. An allowance shall be provided to the trainees (400 Php per day) and will be given on the last day of the training. During the program, the trainees will be equipped with knowledge about technical, customer service, communication, and presentation skills. The trainer will measure each trainee based on his/her performance, assessments, attendance, and behavior.</p>

<p>On the last day of training, the trainees will undergo through revalidation process and will get a chance to be hired as an employee of <strong>Trends Group Inc.</strong></p>

<p><em>Possible positions if ever got hired after the program:</em></p>

<ul>
<li>Systems Engineer</li>
<li>Service Delivery Engineer</li>
<li>Network Operations Center (NOC) Analyst</li>

Autohub Group of Companies, Inc. is a registered business under the Securities and Exchange Commission on July 19, 2007, with its corporate office at Block 15, Ford Global City Building, Rizal Drive, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig. Its primary function is to manage the different dealerships/brands indicated above. It is headed by its President and Dealer Principal, Mr. Willy Q. Tee Ten.

Autohub is your One-Stop-Auto Shop! Its product range consists of high-end to entry level vehicles (i.e. passenger cars, SUV’s, pick-ups, 4-6 wheeler cab and chassis trucks and motorcycles), genuine and aftermarket parts and accessories, and car care products.

Autohub is equipped with the world’s finest machines, as well as highly trained, qualified sales and service personnel, to provide its clientele with all their vehicle requirement’s needs while maintaining excellent customer satisfaction through efficient and quality customer oriented programs and the centralization of its group sales and service activities.

VISION – to be the preferred Automotive Group for innovative solutions, quality products and reliable services.

MISSION – to provide comprehensive automotive products and services through synergy that would ensure complete customer satisfaction and best interest of all stakeholders.

Hunter’s Hub caters to numerous clients in a multitude of industries, and has a wide-range of candidate selections to suit any of our clients’ needs. 2020-09-23T03:07:39.773209+00:00 2021-09-23T00:53:11.276000+00:00 false seo-marketing-services-inc Company Background

SEO Hacker started out as a website that publishes expert SEO tactics and strategies. Through the years, this website evolved into the SEO and Internet Marketing Services Company it is today. Officially opening its doors for business back in 2010, SEO Hacker caters to many clients in various industries and boasts having specialists and mavens in its digital marketing team. Overall, SEO Hacker aims to provide clients with the best quality services they can offer.

About Us

SEO Hacker is a knowledge-based internet marketing firm which specializes in Search Engine Optimization (SEO). As a Digital Marketing firm, we not only aim to provide clients with SEO services but also aim to educate them with other facets of digital marketing and SEO - all in the efforts to improve their branding online.

We aim to offer our services to both small and large scale businesses, helping their websites naturally rank in Google and other search engines. Consequently, we also fortify their online branding. These services include conceptualizing, designing, developing and managing their website, content creation, Search Engine Optimization, online reputation management, search engine marketing, display advertising, and Social Media Marketing.

Our Vision: To see 500 digitally empowered companies by SEO Hacker experiencing huge growth in their online presence and conversions.

Our Mission: SEO Hacker exists to provide ethical, powerful strategies and execution to EMPOWER companies in generating more revenue in the digital market.

Interested to Make things Happen?
SEO Hacker is all about empowering companies and individual entities to generate more revenue in the digital market. We are Energetic, Motivated and Passionate people who Absolutely Love what we do.
We are on a mission to WIN and make WINNERS and we are looking for other like-minded, high-quality people to join us.

<strong>The Impact:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>In this role you will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the exciting expansion of our client segmentation model.</li>
<li>You’ll be part of the global Primary team dedicated to providing high quality client experiences through a self-disruptive mindset and collaborative pod structure.</li>
<li>This team will have a special focus on the growth of the overall book of business through greenfield opportunities in addition to renewal of existing business.</li>
</ul>

<p><br>
<strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Proactive outreach to assigned accounts to ensure client satisfaction through thorough understanding of customers’ workflow</li>
<li>Discuss current service use case</li>
<li>Assess clients' needs for new opportunities and work to close greenfield sales</li>
<li>Ability to excel in a matrixed environment by coordinating with Prospecting, Customer Success, and Marketing to promote book of business growth</li>
<li>Manage incoming calls and e-mails from assigned accounts</li>
<li>Provide client training through a variety of channels</li>
<li>Contact all new contracts added and users to drive product's adoption</li>
<li>Act as point person for timely client resolution when engaging cross-functional department across MI organization and provide feedback to product management</li>
<li>Document all client interactions and actively coordinate outreach efforts with thoughtful use of CRM tool</li>
<li>Secure renewal through coordination with pod lead, manager, and other teammates</li>
<li>Demonstrate ability to communicate MI's value subscription pricing effectively and clearly</li>

<li>At least 3 years of experience </li>
<li>Strong written and verbal communication skills.</li>
</ul>

The ETL Developer is responsible for data loading and manipulation to ensure that the data sources are efficiently and effectively loaded into the data warehouse or data lake. The ETL Developer is responsible for determining the data storage needs of the Department and ensure that the specific business needs are represented. The ETL Developer will have a deep and knowledge of data gathering, analysis, mapping, extraction, transformation and manipulation, cleansing, execution, and loading including experience in data validation by collaboration with clients and in-house Departments.</p>

<p>Key Job Functions and Duties:</p>

<ul>
<li>Establish and enforce data warehousing standards to meet requirements and business needs.</li>
<li>Evaluate existing subject areas stored in the data warehouse and determines where data should be stored.</li>
<li>Review ETL programs for compliance with best practices, standards, enterprise architecture and documentation requirements, ETL process, programs and scripts.</li>
<li>Perform quality assurance testing of data integration and report development and monitor data load operations to ensure accuracy.</li>
<li>Analyze data and processes to create automated solution using ETL.</li>
<li>Develop ETL packages that will read data from different sources which will then be processed</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:22:43.198340+00:00 IT and Software Cityland 10 Tower 2, 154 H.V Dela Costa St. Corner Valero, Bel-air, Makati City Pasig Philippines Metro Manila 143003 false false ETL Developer 10 1 <p>General skills:</p>

<li>Dimensional modeling experience</li>
<li>Experience interfacing with business users and understanding their requirements</li>
<li>Strong Project Management skills</li>
</ul>

<p>Desired Experience &amp; Qualities:</p>

<ul>
<li>Five years’ ETL development, preferably for large, complex data sets.</li>

<li>Solid experience in analyzing query performance issues and modifying data structures or application code to remedy performance problems.</li>
<li>Knowledge of logical and physical data modeling concepts (relational and dimensional).</li>

<li>Experience with Hadoop Components – HDFS, Spark, Hbase, Hive, Sqoop is highly desired.</li>

<p>Civicom Global Solutions offers the outsourcing of administrative and operations services to corporations. We offer a wide variety of services so that our clients can focus on other things while we do the job for them – an instant extension of their office. <strong>Credentialing Specialists</strong> are responsible for processing credentialing applications, that is, to establish eligibility/legitimacy of licensed medical professionals for insurance companies. The tasks include but are not limited to database management, verification of data, preparation of application, and coordination with internal departments and / or external entities.</p>

<p>With attitude and ability at the top of our mind, we need people with similar or equivalent experience whether in industry, function, or educational background. While some training will be given to the right people, we need those who can hit the ground running.</p>

<p>As part of this exclusive process for one of our clients, a <strong>Credentialing Specialist</strong> is tasked to</p>

<ul>
<li>Meet with Providers to discuss contracting and insurance requirements</li>
<li>Process provider credentialing information, verify data in accordance with policies and procedures</li>
<li>Prepare and submit all appropriate applications and required supporting documentation</li>
<li>Follow-up with insurance companies to ensure timely processing of applications and contracts</li>
<li>Educate providers on credentialing and contracting guidelines and requirements</li>
<li>Maintain credentialing database and track all direct provider contract data</li>
<li>Perform primary and secondary source verifications of credentials according to departmental policy</li>
<li>Facilitate monthly and or weekly meetings with insurance provider representatives to ensure escalated issues are handled and resolved in a timely manner</li>
<li>Run daily production and task inventory, discuss with management appropriate course of action to maintain work load and productivity requirements</li>
<li>Ensure production goals are met while maintaining quality</li>
